signup.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
signup.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
signup.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
signup.password_number: Password must contain at least one number
signup.password_special: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
landing.title: CP Support in Seconds
landing.description: Connecting you with the specialists and devices that you need for lifelong care.
landing.connecting: Connecting you with the specialists and devices that you need for lifelong care.
landing.find_care_search: Search for Specialists in your area based on your location, your needs, or your specific type of CP.
landing.find_devices_search: Browse through hundreds of assistive devices to find the one that is perfect for your needs.
landing.empowering_description: Giving you the freedom to choose the care that you want, when you want it. Select from hundreds of specialists in your area and begin your path to new possibilities.
